level.heading: DESCRIPTION OF THE D.C. QUICK CASH GAME (ยง 30-911)

level.text: The Agency may operate any one of the following D.C. QUICK CASH games by which players select the requisite numbers out of the total numbers:
Five (5) numbers out of forty (40) possible numbers;
Five (5) numbers out forty-five (45) possible numbers;
Five (5) numbers out of fifty-two (52) possible numbers;
Six (6) numbers out of thirty-one (31) possible numbers;
Six (6) numbers out of thirty-three (33) possible numbers;
Six (6) numbers out of thirty-six (36) possible numbers;
Six (6) numbers out of thirty-nine (39) possible numbers;
Six (6) numbers out of forty (40) possible numbers; or
Six (6) numbers out of forty-five (45) possible numbers.

The price of a QUICK CASH game ticket shall be three (3) boards for one dollar ($1) or any other price designated by the Executive Director from a price schedule adopted by the Board pursuant to ยง500.
